wiki.summary: This is the lead single from American singer-songwriter Norah Jones' fourth album, The Fall. The song marks a new direction for Jones. She explained in publicity materials: "For this record, I just had a sound in my head. I wanted the grooves to be more present and heavy. And I also just wanted to do something different." She added that the new sound began to present itself on this song, which was one of the first numbers that Jones wrote for the project.

track.name: Chasing Pirates
comments: has an unusually fresh and beautifully different vocal-love her music
This is a very good song but I disagree with jazz being its 1st tag, it's not jazz at all
I love the feel of this song.
Its a couple of seconds to wrap your head around the beat...then your head drops in..
